name: Mercury
description: Mercury is the smallest and innermost planet in the Solar System.

name: Venus
description: Venus is the second planet from the Sun and is the hottest one.

name: Earth
description: Earth is the third planet from the Sun and the only one known to support life.

name: Mars
description: Mars is the fourth planet from the Sun, known as the Red Planet.

name: Jupiter
description: Jupiter is the largest planet in the Solar System.

name: Saturn
description: Saturn is known for its prominent ring system.

name: Uranus
description: Uranus has a unique sideways rotation and faint rings.

name: Neptune
description: Neptune is the farthest known planet from the Sun in our Solar System.

name: Sun
description: The Sun is the star at the center of the Solar System.
